q: Taxation is the primary source of government ______.

o: Tax paid directly by the taxpayer

q: Direct taxes cannot be shifted to others.

o: Year in which income is assessed and taxed

q: Assessment year follows the previous year.

o: Year in which income is earned

q: NRI is taxed only on Indian ______.

o: Five categories of income under Income Tax

o: Profit from sale of capital assets

q: Capital gains are taxed on ______ of assets.

o: Income not under other four heads

o: Credit for tax paid on inputs
